name: Pumpkin Chaos
description:
This game is a submission for Cozy autumn game jam (2022).

This is our the first game jam entry. Our sole goal is to have fun, learn and get better. We hope you have fun too and of course feedback is appreciated.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Credits:

Both of us are programmers with no art skills at all,  we had to use external free art assets.

  • Tile set used
  • First pumpkin sprite
  • Gun sprite
  • Player Sprite
